method.name: ${binding-prefix}_new_${suffix}
method.comment: Creates a new #${obj-type} holding ${value-name}.

method.name: ${binding-prefix}_get_${suffix}
method.comment: Returns value of the ${value-name} @self

method.name: ${binding-prefix}_set_${suffix}
method.comment: Sets value to the ${value-name} @self

method.name: ${binding-prefix}_new_${suffix}
method.comment: Creates a new #${obj-type} holding ${value-name}. * * Note: this uses a copy of the structured type, not the one stored in the @value

method.name: ${binding-prefix}_get_${suffix}
method.comment: Returns value of the ${value-name} @self * * Note: this uses a copy of the structured type, not the one stored in the @self

method.name: ${binding-prefix}_set_${suffix}
method.comment: Sets value to the ${value-name} @self * * Note: this uses a copy of the structured type, not the one stored in the @self

method.name: ${binding-prefix}_new_${suffix}
method.comment: Creates a new #${obj-type} holding ${value-name}.

method.name: ${binding-prefix}_new_${suffix}_list

parameter.name: value
parameter.comment: the array value to use for the new #${obj-type}

method.comment: Note: this uses a copy of the array, not the one stored in the @value

method.name: ${binding-prefix}_get_${suffix}${binding-get-set-suffix}
method.comment: Gets the value of the @self of ${value-name}. * * Note: this returns copy of the array, not the one stored in the @self

method.name: ${binding-prefix}_set_${suffix}${binding-get-set-suffix}
method.comment: Sets the value of the @self of ${value-name}. * * Note: this uses a copy of the array, not the one stored in the @value

method.name: ${binding-prefix}_get_${suffix}_size
method.comment: Returns number of elements in the @self of ${value-name}

method.name: ${binding-prefix}_get_${suffix}_nth
method.comment: Returns the n-th element of the @self of ${value-name}

method.name: ${binding-prefix}_add_${suffix}

parameter.name: x_value
parameter.comment: an X name, or %NULL; when set, the @value should a corresponding X value

method.comment: Adds an element.

method.name: ${binding-prefix}_remove_${suffix}

parameter.name: x_value
parameter.comment: an X name, or %NULL; when set, the @value should be a corresponding X value

method.comment: Removes an element with the provided value.

method.name: ${binding-prefix}_new_${suffix}
method.comment: Creates a new #${obj-type} holding ${value-name}.

method.name: ${binding-prefix}_new_${suffix}_list

parameter.name: value
parameter.comment: the string array as a value for the new ${obj-type} holding ${value-name}

method.comment: Creates a new #${obj-type} holding ${value-name}. * * Note: this uses a copy of the string array, not the one stored in the @value

method.name: ${binding-prefix}_get_${suffix}${binding-get-set-suffix}
method.comment: Gets the value of the @self of ${value-name}. * * Note: this returns copy of the string array, not the one stored in the @self

method.name: ${binding-prefix}_set_${suffix}${binding-get-set-suffix}
method.comment: Sets the value of the @self of ${value-name}. * * Note: this uses a copy of the string array, not the one stored in the @value

method.name: ${binding-prefix}_get_${suffix}_size
method.comment: Returns number of elements in the @self of ${value-name}

method.name: ${binding-prefix}_get_${suffix}_nth

parameter.name: position
parameter.comment: Position of the ${value-name} item to get

method.comment: Returns the n-th element of the @self of ${value-name}

method.name: ${binding-prefix}_add_${suffix}

parameter.name: value
parameter.comment: the string to add into the @self

method.comment: Adds a string into the @self of ${value-name}.

method.name: ${binding-prefix}_remove_${suffix}

parameter.name: value
parameter.comment: the string to remove from the @self

method.comment: Removes a string from the @self of ${value-name}.

parameter.name: value
parameter.comment: the string array as a value for the new ${obj-type} holding ${value-name}
